00043 using namespace std;
00044 
00045 // standard lush magic numbers
00046 #define MAGIC_FLOAT_MATRIX              0x1e3d4c51
00047 #define MAGIC_PACKED_MATRIX             0x1e3d4c52
00048 #define MAGIC_DOUBLE_MATRIX             0x1e3d4c53
00049 #define MAGIC_INTEGER_MATRIX    0x1e3d4c54
00050 #define MAGIC_BYTE_MATRIX           0x1e3d4c55
00051 #define MAGIC_SHORT_MATRIX              0x1e3d4c56
00052 #define MAGIC_SHORT8_MATRIX             0x1e3d4c57
00053 #define MAGIC_LONG_MATRIX               0x1e3d4c58
00054 #define MAGIC_ASCII_MATRIX              0x2e4d4154      /* '.MAT' */
00055 
00056 // pascal vincent's magic numbers
00057 #define MAGIC_UBYTE_VINCENT             0x0800
00058 #define MAGIC_BYTE_VINCENT              0x0900
00059 #define MAGIC_SHORT_VINCENT             0x0B00
00060 #define MAGIC_INT_VINCENT                       0x0C00
00061 #define MAGIC_FLOAT_VINCENT             0x0D00
00062 #define MAGIC_DOUBLE_VINCENT    0x0E00
00063
